The issue is not WHO is running. The issue is are WE going to become and remain vigilant citizens who prioritize our politics and culture and rights, over television and instant gratification? It's up to us, why aren't you doing articles on voting and the lack there of, and the low numbers that turn out? Why aren't you doing stories on the need to be involved all the time, and to demand accountability from all elected officials?
